str2: Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To live the life of a citizen, live. Middle voice of a derivative of polites; to behave as a citizen.
Worthily, in a manner worthy of. Adverb from axios; appropriately.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To come, go.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To be absent. From apo and eimi; to be away.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To stand fast, stand firm, persevere. From the perfect tense of histemi; to be stationary, i.e. to persevere.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Wind, breath, spirit.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and athleo; to wrestle in company with, i.e. to seek jointly.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as euaggelizo; a good message, i.e. The gospel.
